name: Rich Garden House Hotel
description: Rich Garden House Hotel features rooms in Chiang Mai. Located in the Sunday Walking Street district, the property provides guests with access to a restaurant. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge for guests. The rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. With a private bathroom, rooms at the hotel also boast free WiFi. All guest rooms are fitted with a seating area. Chedi Luang Temple is 1500 metres from Rich Garden House Hotel, while City Art & Cultural Centre is 1200 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 5 km from the property.

name: Buri Sriping Riverside Resort & Spa - Sha Extra Plus
description: Set in Chiang Mai, 2.4 km from Chiang Mai Bus Station, Buri Sriping Riverside Resort & Spa - SHA Extra Plus offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a hot tub. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bidet. Buri Sriping Riverside Resort & Spa - SHA Extra Plus features some units with pool views, and every room is fitted with a kettle. At the accommodation all rooms include bed linen and towels. Buri Sriping Riverside Resort & Spa - SHA Extra Plus offers an American or Asian breakfast. Chiang Mai Night Bazaar is 3.1 km from the hotel, while Tha Pae Gate is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 9 km from Buri Sriping Riverside Resort & Spa - SHA Extra Plus.

name: Baan Suan Residence
address: 78/1 Moo3, 700th Anniversary Rd., Muang, Chiang Mai, Chiang Mai 50300
description: Located in Chiang Mai, Baan Suan Residence เฮือนพักบ้านสวน offers an outdoor pool and bicycle rental. It provides rooms and villas with free WiFi. The property also has a library. Surrounded by nature, all villas and rooms come with a balcony, refrigerator and cable flat-screen TV. Bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub. Some villas have a private pool. For guests’ convenience, the property provides laundry and daily maid service. Free shuttle services for the city centre and airport are available. Guests can enjoy Thai dishes at the restaurant. Room service can be arranged upon request. The city centre is 8 km away, while Chiang Mai International Airport is a 20-minute drive from the property.

name: Shewe Wana Boutique Hotel
description: Set amidst a beautiful landscaped garden, Shewe Wana Boutique Resort and Spa offers a tropical retreat in central Chiang Mai. It offers full spa services, an outdoor pool and free WiFi. Guests can enjoy one-way shuttle to various attractions in Chiang Mai free of charge. Shewe Wana Boutique Resort and Spa is a 10-minute walk from Naowarat Bridge and a 20-minute walk from Chiang Mai Old City. With just a short walk, guests will find a variety of international restaurants, pubs and café along the Ping River. For extra convenience, the resort also offers free tuk-tuk shuttle services to Chiang Mai Night Bazzar and Chiang Mai Railway Station. The cosy air-conditioned rooms feature locally-made furnishings using natural materials. Each is equipped with a cable TV, minibar and personal safe. En suite bathrooms come with a hairdryer and shower facilities. Guests can join a yoga class or indulge in a relaxing massage at the spa. The resort also provides a tour desk and laundry services. Aside from a daily breakfast, the 2 on-site restaurants serve a variety of vegetarian, Thai and European dishes. The restaurants also feature garden views and various customized menus like gluten-free meals, which is available upon request.

name: Peak Nimman Prestige Hotel
description: Situated in the famous Nimman Haemin area is the Peak Nimman Prestige Hotel which offers a blend of the traditional Lanna and modern contemporary designs. Fitted with teak and wood-carving furnishings throughout, the hotel also features it's signature gong at noon and 18:00 hrs. everyday as a traditional way of time telling. All rooms have a private bathroom, while certain rooms will provide you with a city view. Guest rooms at Peak Nimman Prestige Hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an Asian or an American breakfast. Around-the-clock assistance is available at the reception. Situated right in the trendy Nimman Haemin district, guests can find various restaurants, cafes and shops within a short walk. For more shopping and dining options, guests can also check out MAYA Lifestyle Shopping Center which is only 500 metres away. Chiang Mai International Airport is 6 km away.

name: Sunny V Hotel
description: Set in Chiang Mai, 3 km from Chiang Mai Night Bazaar, Sunny V Hotel offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and organising tours for guests. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Every room has a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at Sunny V Hotel have a balcony. The units will provide guests with a fridge. Tha Pae Gate is 3.8 km from the accommodation, while Central Plaza Chiang Mai Airport is 4.2 km away. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 5 km from Sunny V Hotel.

name: Joy's House
description: Featuring free WiFi, Joy's House & Tour offers accommodation outside of Chiang Mai's city centre. The old city area is 15 km away. It has an outdoor pool and sun terrace, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Free private parking is available on site. Some units feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Every room includes a private bathroom. A TV is featured. You will find free shuttle service at the property. The bed and breakfast also offers free use of bicycles. Chiang Mai Bus Station and Central Festival Chiang Mai are within is 4.5 km of the property. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, a 20-minute drive away.

name: Burirattana Hotel
address: 1151-5 Rachadamnoen Road, Phra Singh, Chiang Mai 50200
description: Situated in Chiang Mai, 400 metres from Tha Pae Gate, Burirattana Hotel features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 700 metres from Three Kings Monument. At the hotel the rooms have air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. Rooms have a safety deposit box, while selected rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature pool views. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. The daily breakfast offers à la carte, Asian or vegetarian options. Popular points of interest near Burirattana Hotel include Chedi Luang Temple, Chang Puak Gate and Chiang Mai Gate. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 4 km from the accommodation.

name: Away Chiang Mai Thapae Resort - A Vegan Retreat
address: 9 Thapae Soi 5, Thapae Road, Chiang Mai 50200
description: Away Chiang Mai Thapae Resort A Vegan Retreat is a modern-classic resort with 37 exclusive rooms in the heart of Chiang Mai City, 15 minutes drive from the airport, 5 minutes walk to Thapae gate or night market. The resort thrives on impeccable traditional lanna-hospitality, tranquil ambiance and true relaxation. Additionally, Moreganic Restaurant serves an extensive innovative high-quality vegetarian cuisine.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Old City Wall Inn
description: Located in Chiang Mai, less than 1 km from Chiang Mai Night Bazaar, The Old City Wall Inn provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a tour desk and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from Chiang Mai Gate. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms are equipped with a kitchenette with a microwave. At The Old City Wall Inn each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers American, Asian or vegetarian options. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 3-star hotel. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Tha Pae Gate, Chedi Luang Temple and Three Kings Monument. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 4 km from The Old City Wall Inn.

name: Le ville lanna boutique hotel
address: 8/1 ซอย 1ค ถนนราชเชียงแสน ตำบลหายยา, Chiang Mai 50100
description: Situated 500 metres from Chiang Mai Gate, Le ville lanna boutique hotel offers 3-star accommodation in Chiang Mai and has an outdoor swimming pool, a garden and a restaurant. The property is set 1.5 km from Three Kings Monument, 2.3 km from Central Plaza Chiang Mai Airport and 2.3 km from Wat Phra Singh. The hotel also features free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms have a wardrobe. Continental and American breakfast options are available each morning at Le ville lanna boutique hotel. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Chedi Luang Temple, Chiang Mai Night Bazaar and Tha Pae Gate. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 3 km from Le ville lanna boutique hotel.

name: De Lanna Hotel
address: 44 Intawarorot Road Tambol Sripoom, Chiang Mai 50100
description: This boutique hotel offering contemporary Thai rooms with a private balcony and free Wi-Fi. Situated a 5-minute walk from Chiang Mai’s Sunday Walking Street, it houses an outdoor saltwater pool and a restaurant. Spacious air-conditioned rooms feature northern Thai furnishings and a seating area. The modern rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a DVD player. Private bathrooms come with a rainshower and Thai herbal toiletries. De Lanna Hotel is 300 metres from Three Kings Monument and the City Art and Cultural Centre. The Chiang Mai International Airport is 3 km away. Guests can use the business centre or make travel arrangements at the tour desk. An airport shuttle service is available. De Lanna Restaurant serves a variety of local and international dishes. For drinks, guests can head to the poolside bar. In-room dining is possible.

name: Treevana Club Chiangmai
address: 47 Viang Bua Road Chang Phuak, Chiang Mai 50300
description: Set within landscaped grounds, Treevana Club Chiangmai offers charming rooms with white furnishings. A 10-minute drive from Nimmanhemin Road, it features a restaurant, 24-hour reception, and free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms come with cable TV and a fridge with 2 free bottled waters. Each room has a private bathroom with toiletries and shower facilities. Treevana Club Chiangmai is a 20-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. Kad Suan Kaew Central Department Store is 5 minutes’ drive away. A range of local restaurants are located within 200 metre of the property. Guest can enjoy free coffee and tea at the the dining area. The resort offers car rental, as well as laundry and ironing services.

name: The Oriental Siam Resort
description: Surrounded by tropical greenery and flowers, Oriental Siam Resort - SHA Extra Plus Certified is a garden retreat just 10 minutes' drive from Chiang Mai City. Free WiFi, free bicycle usage and 2 outdoor pools are available. Air-conditioned villas have access to a private garden and are decorated with elegant teak furnishings. A flat-screen TV, DVD player and en suite bathrooms with shower and bathtub are included in all rooms. Guests enjoy a free minibar and welcome drink. Oriental Siam is situated next to a temple with views of Doi Suthep Mountain. It is a 10-minute drive to Chiangmai Airport and local arts and handicraft villages. A free shuttle service to Promenada Resort Mall Chiang Mai is also available. Guests can enjoy traditional Thai massage nearby, or exercise at the gym. Other services include a tour desk and car rental. Local Thai dishes are served at the property’s on-site restaurant or served in the villa.

name: Nanta Glam CM Hotel & Residences
description: Set in Chiang Mai, 600 metres from Chiang Mai Gate, Nanta Glam CM Hotel & Residences offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has pool views, and guests can enjoy access to a shared lounge and to a bar. The hotel has a hot tub, room service and free WiFi. At the hotel all rooms have air conditioning, a desk, a terrace with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. Nanta Glam CM Hotel & Residences provides some units with mountain views, and each room is fitted with a balcony. All guest rooms feature a safety deposit box. The accommodation offers an American or Asian breakfast. Popular points of interest near Nanta Glam CM Hotel & Residences include Chedi Luang Temple, Central Plaza Chiang Mai Airport and Three Kings Monument. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International, 3 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Thee Kashatharn By Th District
address: 6/2 Rakaeng Road, Soi 2, T. Haiya, Chiang Mai
description: Located in the heart of THEE Kashatharn by TH District offers modern rooms with air conditioning and an LCD TV, 800 metres from Night Bazaar. It features an outdoor swimming pool. The rooms at THEE Kashatharn by TH District are equipped with a minibar, a private bathroom and cable TV. Some rooms have a private balcony with views of the city and the Doi Suthep Mountain. Guests can enjoy Thai and European breakfast. Surcharged airport shuttle services can be arranged upon request. THEE Kashatharn by TH District has a tour desk which organises tours and trekking excursions to various hill tribes, the Doi Suthep Mountain Temple and Chiang Rai’s Golden Triangle. It is located 1 km from Sunday Walking Street and old town.

name: Cross Chiang Mai Riverside
address: 369/1 Charoenraj Road, Wat Ket, Muang, Chiang Mai 50000
description: Cross Chiang Mai Riverside resort is the first Cross resort in Thailands cultural capital, Chiang Mai. In keeping with its well-earned reputation for building and managing boutique hotels of uncompromising luxury, the Cross Chiang Mai Riverside resort is no exception.The hotel is situated on the tranquil banks of the Ping River. The surroundings provide a balance of serenity with a dash of the vibrant Chiang Mai city center just minutes away. The luxury hotel offers a unique design that blends modern elements with the traditional Lanna style that is a hallmark of Northern Thailand living.The luxury 5-story resort features 29 elegantly designed suites. Nature takes center stage as the resorts courtyard is interspersed with leafy 100-year- old tamarind trees, while the Ozone Gym-Pool- Roofbar overlooks the tranquil flow of the Ping river. Guests can enjoy the luxurious Cross Spa and fitness facilities, as well as fine dining in the Oxygen dining room.The Library Bar & Caf is a casual yet chic chill zone, a haven away from the hustle, bustle and heat! Downtime and relaxation meet good quality, affordable food and unique cocktails with a varied wine menu. Chess, magazines and quick Wi-Fi make this lounge caf a perfect hideaway or another choice to have high tea, snacks and drinksThe Cross Chiang Mai Riverside resort offers guests the very essence of true boutique resort luxury, The Cross experience promises to bring to Chiang Mai a new standard of hospitality, comfort and excitement. The journey north begins at Cross, bringing you a unique blend of culture, elegance, fine dining, and funiHotelier/iStay

name: Amaravati Wellness Center and Resort
description: Set in Mae Rim, 10 km from Queen Sirikit Botanic Garden, Amaravati Wellness Center SHA Plus offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. The 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a patio with a mountain view. At Amaravati Wellness Center SHA Plus all rooms have bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a vegetarian or vegan breakfast. Mae Jo University is 12 km from Amaravati Wellness Center SHA Plus, while Chiang Mai 700th Anniversary Stadium is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Pha Thai House
description: Peacefully located in the heart of Chiang Mai old town, Pha Thai House offers an accommodation with gardens and an outdoor swimming pool. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. It is a 5-minute walk from Chiang Mai Gate and a night market. Featuring wooden flooring and furnishings, the air conditioned rooms come with a refrigerator and a desk. Certain rooms has a balcony and safe deposit box. En suite bathrooms include a hot and cold shower. Each room also has a seating area and refrigerator. Free bottled water is provided daily. For relaxation, massage services and spa facilities are available. There is also free public parking for guests. Local restaurants can be found nearby the property. Pha Thai House is a 7-minute walk from Wat Phra Singh Temple, while Chedi Luang Temple is a 10-minute walk away. Warorot Market is a 15-minute walk away. It is a 20-minute drive to Chiang Mai International Airport.

name: Sala Lanna Chiang Mai
address: 49 Charoenrat Road, Wat Gate, Chiang Mai 50000
description: Located along the well known Ping River of Chiang Mai, sala lanna Chiang Mai features cosy accommodation and the convenience of on-site dining options. Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the residence and computers are available for guests to use in the reception area. sala lanna is a 5-minute drive from Thapae Gate. Chiang Mai International Airport and Airport Plaza Shopping Centre are a 20-minute ride away. Comfortable rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with a DVD player and a minibar. En suite bathrooms come with shower facilities. A hairdryer, bathrobes and slippers are provided in all rooms. Guests can relax by taking a dip in the pool or enjoy in-room and poolside massage treatments upon request. Staff at the reception can help guests with excursion to tourist attractions. Laundry and dry cleaning services are available. Dine to charming views of Ping River at sala lanna eatery and bar, which serves a variety of international dishes and a selection of traditional Thai cuisine. Italia, an open-air restaurant offers finest choice of Italian cuisine for dinner. Enjoy refreshing beverages and light snacks at the rooftop Sky Bar which features panoramic views of Ping River and the surrounding area.

name: Ping Nakara Boutique Hotel & Spa
description: Set in a colonial-style building in Chiang Mai, Ping Nakara Boutique Hotel And Spa offers rooms with free Wi-Fi. The hotel has an outdoor pool, a restaurant and lobby bar. Ping Nakara Boutique Hotel features rooms with hand-crafted furniture and bathroom amenities from the hotel’s spa. Each air-conditioned room comes with a cable TV, minibar and DVD player. Massages, facial and body treatments are offered at the Nakara Spa. Internet access is available at the hotel’s library. The hotel provides free parking. Guests can enjoy Asian food including traditional Thai cuisine at Ping Nakara Restaurant open daily from 11:00 until 22:00 hrs. Room service is available. Drinks are served at the Lobby Bar. Ping Nakara Boutique Hotel And Spa is a 5-minute walk to the Night Bazaar. Also within walking distance is the Ping Riverside Garden.

name: Veranda High Residence
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a spa and wellness centre, Veranda High Residence is located in Hang Dong. It boasts luxury accommodation and the convenience of on-site parking. Free Wi-FI is available throughout the residence. Veranda High Residence is 3.2 km from Chiang Mai Night Safari and 7 km from Royal Flora Park. Chiang Mai Airport is 8 km away. Featuring floor-to ceiling glass doors and a private balcony, each air-conditioned unit is equipped with a sofa seating area and a flat-screen TV with a DVD player. Extras include a refrigerator and a minibar. An en suite bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Slippers and bathrobes are provided. Guests can work out at the well-equipped fitness centre. Other facilities include kids' club and luggage storage. Meeting facilities are available on site. For meals, enjoy European dishes at The Higher Room. Other dining options include Rabiang Cha Restaurant, which serves a fusion of Lanna Thai cuisine. A range of beverages and healthy smoothies are available at Lobby Bar.

name: Stay with Nimman Chiang Mai
description: This comfortable hotel in Chiang Mai offers complimentary wireless internet, as well as a swimming pool and an airport shuttle. It is a 10-minute drive from Chiang Mai Zoo and provides free public parking on site. The rooms are air conditioned and include slippers, a flat-screen TV and a mini bar. They all have an in-room safe, a seating area and an in-room closet. Guests are able to unwind with a beverage at Stay with Nimman Chiang Mai's bar and dine on European and Thai style food in the restaurant. The hotel also serves breakfast each day. Stay with Nimman Chiang Mai is a 10-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport, and sightseers can easily reach Doi Suthep-Pui National Park by car. Chiang Mai University and Wat Phra Singh are easily accessible by car.Revato

name: Villa San Pee Seua - SHA extra plus
description: Stop at Villa San Pee Seua to discover the wonders of Chiang Mai. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, airport transfer are there for guest's enjoyment. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, outdoor pool, massage, garden, water sports (non-motorized), before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. For reliable service and professional staff, Villa San Pee Seua caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Yantarasri Resort
description: Located in Chiang Mai’s Nimmanhaemin area, Yantarasri Resort offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and private bathrooms. The resort features an outdoor swimming pool, a restaurant and free parking. Yantarasri Resort is a 5-minute walk to various shopping, dining and nightlife outlets in Nimmanhaemin. It is a 5-minute ride from Chiang Mai University and a 10-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. Night Bazaar is a 20-minute ride away. Yantarasri features rooms with a cable TV, minibar and a safety deposit box. Free toiletries and shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a traditional Thai massage during their stay. Other services include a travel desk, laundry and dry cleaning.

name: Feel Nimman Boutique
description: Situated in Chiang Mai, Feel Nimman Boutique features an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. Built in 2017, the property is within just 300 metres of Nimman Haemin and 1.7 km of Ton Payom Market. Located in the Nimmanhaemin district, the hotel is within 2 km of Kad Suan Kaew Shopping Centre. Accessed via stairs only, guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. Every room includes a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, while selected rooms come with a terrace. The units include a wardrobe. Chang Puak Market is 2.4 km from the hotel, while Suan Dok Gate is 3 km from the property. Chiang Mai International Airport is 5 km away.

name: Puripunn Hideaway
description: Located in Chiang Mai, Puripunn Hideaway Baby Grand Boutique is a 20-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. The hotel features a spa, cafe and rooms with free WiFi. Puripunn Hideaway Baby Grand is 900 metres from the Wat Kate Temple Museum and a 10-minute walk from Chang Klan Street. The hotel offers free shuttle services to the Night Bazaar and Warorot Market. Rooms at the Puripunn Hideaway Baby Grand feature a flat-screen TV and a terrace that overlooks the swimming pool. A minibar, safe, and tea/coffee making facilities are also provided. Shower facilities and a bathtub are included in an en suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a massage at the Sala Spa or work-out at the fitness centre. The hotel offers laundry and dry cleaning services. Guests can access the upper floors by stairs. The on-site Punna Café serves traditional Thai, Northern Thai and European dishes. Other dining options include the Pool Lounge, which provides light snacks and drinks.

name: De Chai Colonial Hotel & Spa
address: 6/3 Thapae Soi 4, Changklan Maung, Chiang Mai 50300
description: Stylish colonial design is the trademark of De Chai Hotel, with its indoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Located along Thapae Road, it is a 5-minute walk from the Sunday Walking Street. De Chai The Colonial Hotel is a 10-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. Local attractions such as the popular Night Bazaar and historic Kad Luang Market are within a 10-minute stroll from the hotel. Fully air-conditioned and extra spacious, rooms at De Chai are equipped with 37-inch flat-screen TVs, DVD players and iPod docks. Beautiful city views can be enjoyed through the clear floor-to-ceiling windows. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Guests may indulge in a traditional Thai massage or arrange a day trip at the tour desk. For convenience, the hotel also provides laundry services and free parking. Shuttle service can be provided at additional charge. The Colonial De Chai Hotel’s restaurant serves a wide selection of authentic Thai and European dishes. A daily buffet breakfast is also available there. Limited parking available.

name: Rachamankha Hotel
description: Rachamankha a Member of Relais & Chateaux is located by the Old City Wall in Chiang Mai, only 100 metres to the Sunday Market. The hotel offers free WiFi, an outdoor pool and flat-screen TVs. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with DVD players, a personal safe and a minibar. En suite bathrooms come with a hairdryer, bathrobes and slippers. The hotel features laundry services, a tour desk and massage services at Pool Spa. Computers and internet access are available at the hotel's library. The courtyard restaurant serves a daily breakfast and offers Asian, Chinese, European and American cuisines. Rachamankha a Member of Relais & Chateaux is a 10-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport.

name: 137 Pillars House
address: 2 Soi 1 Nawatgate Road, Tambon Watgate, Chiang Mai 5000
description: 137 Pillars House is a luxurious 30-suite hotel established around a colonial teak homestead built in the early 1880s. It is located in a lush tropical residential enclave that is within walking distance to the historical Wat Gate Khar Rham Temple, Ping River and trendy boutiques on Nimmanhaemin Road.iHotelier/iStay

name: Tao Garden Health Spa & Resort
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Doi Saket, Tao Garden Health Spa & Resort promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, airport transfer are on the list of things guests can enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with slippers, towels, closet, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary). Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Chiang Mai, Tao Garden Health Spa & Resort will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Four Seasons Resort Chiang Mai
address: 502 Moo 1, Mae Rim-Samoeng Old Road, Chiang Mai 50180
description: Four Seasons Resort Chiang Mai overlooks rice fields and mountains in Mae Rim Valley. It features luxurious bungalows with outdoor living spaces. A spa and outdoor swimming pool is available. Four Seasons Chiang Mai offers bungalows decorated with original paintings and Siamese art pieces. It has polished teak floors and rich Thai cotton fabrics. Private bathrooms overlook the garden and feature a separate dressing area. The resort features a well-equipped fitness centre. Guests can also make use of the tennis court or head for a soothing massage. Free bicycle rentals are provided. Other facilities include yoga and cooking classes and babysitting service, which are available with an additional cost. Guests can dine al fresco on the home-style Italian cusine at the open-air Terraces Restaurant while enjoying views of the surrounding rice paddies and distant Doi Suthep. For a more relaxed afternoon and evening, head over to the Ratree Bar and Lounge to enjoy fine wines and signature cocktails. Private dining experiences and a 24-hour room service are also available. Four Seasons offers free shuttle service from Chiang Mai City, which is approximately a 1-hour drive away.

name: Mövenpick Suriwongse Hotel Chiang Mai
description: Close to the famous Night Bazaar, perfectly located for exploring Chiang Mai's many cultural sights and shops, the hotel caters to cultural adventure seekers, embraced by the warmth of local treat combined with Swiss quality service. Its contemporary interior is in perfect harmony with the traditional Thai Lanna style architecture to create a unique and refined ambience. In a buzzing and vibrant atmosphere, we present exciting dining with interactive show kitchens.accorhotels.com

name: Chiang Mai Orchid Hotel
description: Located on Huay Kaew Road, Chiang Mai Orchid is next to Central Kad Suan Kaew Shopping Centre. The hotel features a terrace swimming pool, spa and 4 dining options. Free WiFi access is available. The air-conditioned rooms at the Chiang Mai Orchard feature a private bathroom, minibar and cable TV. Bath robes and slippers are provided. Guests can work-out at Chiang Mai Orchid’s fitness centre, unwind in the sauna or enjoy the variety of treatments and massage therapies at the spa. Car rental and laundry services are also available. Guests can park for free at the hotel. Thai and Western dishes are served at Maerim Coffee Shop. Other dining choices include Phuping Restaurant that offers Chinese food. Chiang Mai Airport is a 9-minute drive away. A free shuttle service to the Sunday walking street and Chiang Mai Night Bazaar is offered.

name: The Chateau Chiangmai Residence
description: The Chateau Chiangmai Residence is located in Chiang Mai, only 200 metres away from Saturday Walking Street and 300 metres from Chiang Mai Gate Market. This self-catering accommodation offers bright and airy rooms, soothing massage treatments and a relaxing spa. During the stay, guests have an access to free WiFi. Featuring a private balcony and mountain views, each air-conditioned apartment is complete with a flat-screen cable TV, a seating area and a dining table. An eclectic kettle and a refrigerator are equipped in all units. Guests can make use of a shower and free toiletries in the en suite bathrooms. For guests’ convenience, Chateau Chiangmai also provides lift and free parking space. Airport shuttle service can be arrange at an additional cost. Centrally located in the popular area, you can find Chiang Mai Gate (320 metres), Chedi Luang Temple (730 metres) and Sunday Walking Street (900 metres). Chiang Mai International Airport can be reached under 3 km. Within a short stroll from the property, you can find a wide range of dining options and night entertainment sites.

name: The Chaya Resort and Spa
address: 141 Suandok Road, T. Suthep, Chiang Mai 50000
description: Offering various soothing spa menu and an outdoor pool, the The Chaya Resort and Spa is set in Chiang Mai, 1.27 km from Nimman Haemin and 2 km from Chiang Mai International Airport. Guests have an access to free WiFi throughout the stay. Featuring a four-posture bed, each Thai-style guestroom at The Chaya is complete with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. All units include an en suite bathroom equipped with a shower, a bathtub and free toiletries. At The Chaya Resort and Spa, guests can make use of a fitness centre, laundry service and a 24-hour front desk. Additional conveniences for all guests are currency exchange, ticketing, and trip planning, all of which can be made at the on-site tour desk. The popular Chiang Mai Night Bazaar is situated 3.3 km from this accommodation; while Doi Suthep can be reached under 2.4 km. A range of traditional Lanna-Thai can be sampled at the resort's restaurant. Alternatively, a range of dining outlets are available within 1 km of this stylish resort.

name: Jasmine Hills Villas & Spa
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 16 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a sauna. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a picnic area. Property Location Located in Doi Saket, Jasmine Hills Villas & Spa is on a lake, a 4-minute drive from Wat Phra That Doi Saket and 13 minutes from Bo Sang Handicraft Centre. This hotel is 8.3 mi (13.4 km) from Saa Paper & Umbrella Handicraft Centre and 9.1 mi (14.7 km) from San Kamphaeng Hot Springs. Dining Enjoy Malaysian cuisine at Jasmine Restuarant, a restaurant where you can take in the garden view, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Rollaway bed fee: THB 400.0 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 2:00 PM Checkin end at 8:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards and cash The front desk is open daily from 7:00 AM - 8:00 PM. This property doesn't offer after-hours check-in. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets not allowed Service animals not allowed General instructions No elevators Car required Essential workers only - NO Property is cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectantViajes Exito Hotels

name: Mountain Creek Wellness Resort Chiang Mai
description: Set in a prime location of Chiang Mai, Mountain Creek Wellness Resort Chiang Mai puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, taxi service, 24-hour security, wheelchair accessible, fax machine are there for guest's enjoyment. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool, massage, solarium. Mountain Creek Wellness Resort Chiang Mai combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Chiang Mai unforgettable.Agoda

name: Eurana Boutique Hotel
address: 7/1 Moonmuang Rd., Sol 7 Sriphum Muang, Chiang Mai 50200
description: Within a 10-minute walk from Wat Chedi Luang and Sunday Walking Street, Eurana Boutique Hotel features accommodation fusing European and modern Northern Thai décor. A spa and pool are available. Guests enjoy free WiFi access. Hotel Eurana is a 2-minute walk from Fresh Market. Night Bazaar and Chiang Mai International Airport are a 15-minute drive away. Colourful rooms at Eurana Boutique comes with a cable TV, a minibar and a safety box. Shower facilities are in an en suite bathroom. Guests can workout at the hotel’s fitness centre or relax at the reading and internet corner. The hotel provides tour arrangement services. Laundry and dry cleaning services are also available. Thai and European cuisine can be enjoyed at The Violet Restaurant. For desserts and tea, Grandmama’s Bake is another dining option.

name: Baan U Sabai Boutique House
address: 213/7 Mahidol Road, T. Changklan, Chiang Mai 50100
description: Baan U Sabai House offers a cultural experience showcasing rooms with 14 different styles of Thai architecture. The hotel has a pool and a spa pool for guests. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are provided. Baan U Sabai Boutique House is a 3-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. It is a 15-minute drive to Night Bazaar. Doi Suthep and Chiang Mai Zoo are a 30-minute ride away. Rooms feature teak wood décor and come with a balcony and outdoor seating area. Each is fitted with a DVD player and flat-screen TV with cable channels. A minibar and tea and coffee-making facilities are provided. A tour desk assists in car rentals and sightseeing arrangements. Laundry and dry cleaning can be done in the hotel. Guests can request for luggage storage, available at the 24-hour front desk.

name: Chiang Mai Marriott Hotel
address: 108 Chang Klan Road, Tambol Chang Klan, Amphur Muang, Chiang Mai 50100
description: Blending European design with Lanna Thai charm, the luxurious Le Meridien is located in downtown Chiang Mai on Changklan Road with a short walking distance from Tha Pae Gate and Warorot Market. The hotel has a pampering spa, an outdoor swimming pool and 4 dining outlets. Free parking is available. Featuring views of Doi Suthep mountain or the city, all elegant rooms come with a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. The spacious en suite bathroom is fitted with a separate bathtub and hot-water shower facilities. Room service is available for 24 hours. The 5-star Le Méridien Chiang Mai - SHA Extra Plus is located in the centre of famous Chiang Mai Night Bazaar. It is 7 km from Chiang Mai International Airport and 25 km from Doi Suthep Temple. The Spa features a relaxing menu of body massage and herbal treatments. Guests can also exercise at the gym or arrange a day trip at the tour desk. There is also an on-site shopping arcade. Favola serves popular Italian dishes with a modern spin, while Latest Recipe offers international buffet spreads from its interactive open kitchen. Snacks and cocktails can be enjoyed at Latitude 18 or the poolside Plunge terrace.

name: Shewe Wana Suite Resort
address: 290,292 Charoen Muang Road, T. Watket, Chiang Mai 50000
description: This intimate boutique property offers restored Thai-style suites with colonial influences and attentive service. Nestled in tropical greenery, it features 2 outdoor pools, and free WiFi throughout. Boasting a spa bath and fine teak fittings, tastefully furnished suites are surrounded by tropical greenery and landscaped gardens. They come with a flat-screen TV and private balcony. Shewe Wana Suite Resort is only a 10-minute walk from the local night bazaar and shops along the Ping River. It is a short walk from San Pa Khoi Market where northern Thai food and fresh fruit can be sampled. It is a 20-minute walk from Chiang Mai Old City and a 20-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. The resort also provides a tour desk, laundry services, and free parking lot. Aside from a daily breakfast, the 2 on-site restaurants serve a variety of vegetarian, Thai dishes. The restaurants also feature garden views and various customized menus like gluten-free meals, which is available upon request. Guests who wish to use airport transfer service are kindly requested to inform the hotel in advance. There is an extra charge to add on to the transport. This can be noted under "Special Requests" during booking or by contacting the property by using the contact details found on the booking confirmation. Guests who wish to check in after 23:00 hrs are kindly requested to inform the property in advance for check-in arrangements.

name: See You Soon Chiangmai
description: See You Soon is conveniently located in the popular Old City area. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Facilities like 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, taxi service are readily available for you to enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer television LCD/plasma screen, cleaning products, complimentary tea, mirror, private entrance to ensure a restful night. Take a break from a long day and make use of hot tub, spa. For reliable service and professional staff, See You Soon caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Bossotel Chiang Mai - Sha Plus
description: Just a few minutes from the well-known Night Bazaar, Bossotel Chiang Mai - SHA Plus offers a budget accommodation and an outdoor pool. It is right by Chiang Mai Railway Station. The hotel 1 km from Night Bazaar and 2 km from Thapae Gate. Chiang Mai Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Bossotel Chiang Mai - SHA Plus provides rooms with views, free Wi-Fi Internet access and fully contained bathrooms. There is an on site restaurant serving international cuisine. Guests can make use of a wide selection of services and facilities such as outdoor swimming pool, snooker, beauty salon, and relax with a massage.

name: Maninarakorn Hotel
address: 99 Sridonchai Rd. T. Changklan, Chiang Mai 50100
description: Maninarakorn Hotel is located in Chiang Mai, less than 700 metres from the Night Bazaar and Thapae Gate. The hotel offers an outdoor spa pool, free Wi-Fi and a spa. Rooms at Maninarakorn come with locally handcrafted furniture and air-conditioning. Amenities include a cable TV, minibar and attached bathrooms. Kinnari Spa features traditional Thai massage and foot reflexology. Guests can relax at the sauna and steam rooms or exercise at the on-site jogging track. ZENZA Restaurant serves a selection of Asian and Western dishes. Children under 8 years old dine an American breakfast for free. Freshly brewed hot drinks are available at the Coffee Shop. Maninarakorn Hotel is approximately 3.5 km from Chiang Mai International Airport and Nimman Haemin Area.

name: Shangri-La Chiang Mai
description: Five-star Shangri-La Hotel offers luxurious accommodation with free wired internet in culturally-rich Chiang Mai, just 10 minutes' drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. A free-form pool and spa are available. Reflecting comfort and elegance, air-conditioned rooms feature beautiful Northern Thai decor and charm. Each comes with a flat-screen TV, DVD player and minibar. A pillow menu and feather duvets are also included. Shangri-La Chiang Mai is about 1.5 km from the famous Night Bazaar, Tha Pae Gate and Sunday Walking Street. It is about 2 km from Chiang Mai Railway Station. The hotel's signature CHI, The Spa provides private spa suites and relaxing beauty treatments. Guests can also exercise at the fitness centre, enjoy a game of tennis or arrange day trips at the tour desk. Kad Kafe serves a selection of all-day international dishes and a buffet breakfast spread. Authentic Szechuan and Cantonese dishes can be sampled at the chic and modern China Kitchen. Drinks can be enjoyed at Dhala Pool Bar while afternoon tea can be found at the Lobby Lounge. The hotel can also arrange vegetarian and Halal meals.

name: Kireethara Boutique Resort
description: Kiree Thara Boutique Resort is a 4-star elegant contemporary Lanna design surrounded by the high green mountains of the significant Doi Suthep. Inspired by the nature with the breathtaking setting of panoramic green mountain and lake. Kiree Thara blends the charm of the Norther Thai style living with the modern living. We offer our guests stunning views from 21 beautifully decorated rooms which makes you feel, relax and individual living, a perfect getaway from noisy downtown. Kiree Thara is vacation discoveries, only 10 minutes from Chiang Mai international Airport, 5 minutes to the nearest golf club, 3 kilometers from Chiang Mai Zoo, 2 Kilometers from 700th Anniversary Chiang Mai Sports Complex and a few minutes from Chiang Mai international Convention Center. The most amazing trips is a variety of recreational activities surrounded by spectacular natural attractions with Lake & Mountain View that you can choose. > DooDoi Café’ and Restaurant, specialized in Thai and Western cuisine > Free Bike Rental, let your bike around for free > Jogging Lane, jogging around the Lake on a road 6 meters wide Kiree Thara Boutique is an idyllic destination that will make you want to come back and explore even more!

name: Green Lake Resort
description: Situated in Chiang Mai, the peaceful Green Lake Resort - SHA Extra Plus Certified boasts an outdoor pool and comfortable guestrooms fitted with a private balcony. Free parking on-site and free WiFi in all rooms are provided. Simply furnished, all rooms are air-conditioned and come with a seating area, a refrigerator and an electric kettle. Fitted with a bath and shower, the private bathroom also includes free toiletries. At Green Lake Resort - SHA Extra Plus Certified, both meeting and banquet facilities are available for a surcharge. Activities such as cycling can also be enjoyed around the property. The 24-hour front desk can assist guests with airport transfer services as well as transfer services to the nearby attractions. The property is 1.6 km from Chiang Mai International Convention and Exhibition Center and 1.8 km from Chiang Mai Lanna Golf Course. For shopping and dining, guests can also check out Nimman Haemin and Kad Suan Kaew Shopping Centre, located approximately a 15-minute drive away. Guests can enjoy a selection of Thai cuisines at the Mountain View Restaurant that overlooks the nearby pond.

name: InterContinental Chiang Mai Mae Ping, an IHG Hotel
address: 153 Sridonchai Road, Chang Klan, Chiang Mai 50110
description: InterContinental Chiang Mai The Mae Ping is located in the heart of Chiang Mai's old city, and a short drive from the international airport. Experience a hotel created with rich story of Lanna Heritage featuring the handiwork of local artisans, while offering a contemporary escape.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Noble Place Chiangmai
description: Located in front of Central Robinson Department Store and just only a 5-minute ride from Chiang Mai International Airport, Noble Place Chiangmai offers free Wi-Fi throughout the property. A 5-minute drive to the City Center, Night Bazaar and Airport Driving Range, Noble Place Chiangmai is a 10-minute drive to Saturday Walking Street and 15-minute drive to Sunday Walking Street and Central Kad Suan Kaew. Chiang Mai Bus Station and Chiang Mai Train Station are a 30-minute ride away. Featuring a balcony, air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, fridge and minibar. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. For extra convenience, there is a 24-hour front desk. Free private parking and free luggage storage is available. A soothing massage can be enjoyed at the spa. Guests can arrange a sight-seeing trip at the tour desk or rent a bicycle to explore the town. A range of Thai and International cuisine is available at Noble Place Restaurant.
